title: Lara Bingle hides her tummy with a baggy sweater amid pregnancy rumors
text:
She has reportedly told friends that she is expecting with her third child.

And Lara Worthington (née Bingle), 32, did little to quell the swirling pregnancy rumours as she shielded her tummy beneath a baggy black sweater while stepping out in Santa Monica on Sunday.

Lara - who already shares sons Rocket, four, and Racer, two, with actor Sam Worthington - paired the loose-fitting garment with black leggings, pink sneakers and a set of square sunglasses.

What's underneath? Lara Worthington (née Bingle), 32, did little to quell swirling pregnancy rumours when she shielded her tummy beneath a baggy black sweater in Santa Monica on Sunday

The former bikini model appeared to go makeup-free, while slicking her flaxen mane into a tight bun.

Lara's outing comes amid persistent rumours she and Sam are expecting their third child together.

In recent months, the model has been spotted with her tummy conspicuously shielded behind loose-fitting attire.

Anything to tell us? Lara - who already shares sons Rocket, four, and Racer, two, with actor Sam Worthington - paired the loose-fitting garment with black leggings, pink sneakers and a set of square sunglasses

In September, she even managed to obscure her midsection from onlookers by carrying her new puppy rather than walking him on a leash.

Meanwhile, a friend of the couple supposedly confirmed their baby news to The Daily Telegraph in August, telling the publication: 'It is early days but she's very excited. Lara is pregnant with her third child.'

In an interview with InStyle in May 2017, Lara admitted that she was keen to expand her family, but wanted to wait a while.

Baby on board? It comes amid persistent rumours Lara and her husband Sam (pictured in 2017) are expecting their third child together

'I think because I've done two [children] back to back I need a rest. It's full on and fun, but it's definitely challenging,' she said at the time.

'You have those days where you're like, 'OMG'. But I feel like that's why I'm here, to lead that legacy. I think for now I'm just really enjoying my little family.'

Lara also previously told OK! Australia that she would love to have a big family.

'The more the merrier. My family brings me so much happiness that nothing else really matters,' she told the magazine.
description: She has reportedly told friends that she is expecting with her third child.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
